mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ad_fileList(fileUUID, company, uniqueFileName, fileName, filePostfix, fileTitle, fileSize, fileVersion, md5Check, uploadByWho, uploadTime, isUploaded, startTime, endTime, boardcastMode, isAudited, auditTime,fileLevel) VALUES (#{fileUUID},#{company},#{uniqueFileName},#{fileName},#{filePostfix},#{fileTitle},#{fileSize},#{fileVersion}, #{md5Check},#{uploadByWho},#{uploadTime},#{isUploaded},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{boardcastMode},#{isAudited},#{auditTime},#{fileLevel})
